Magazine Capacity: 3+1/Caliber: 23mm 00 Buckshot/Fire Mode: Pump-Action//The KS-23 is a pump-action shotgun carbine of Russian origin, firing the unusually large 23mm cartridge through a rifled barrel. Commonly used by police forces, the KS-23 has been adopted under special circumstances for military use.

Magazine Capacity: 7+1/Caliber: 12 Gauge 00 Buckshot/Fire Mode: Semi//The L128A1 is a gas-operated semi-automatic combat shotgun developed in Italy in the late 1990s. Rounds are fed into the weapon with a 7 round tubular magazine, and features a tubular stock and rail system along the top for mounting optics.

Magazine Capacity: 7+1/Caliber: 12 Gauge 00 Buckshot/Fire Mode: Semi//The M1014 is a gas-operated semi-automatic combat shotgun developed in Italy in the late 1990s. Rounds are fed into the weapon with a 7 round tubular magazine, and features a tubular stock and rail system along the top for mounting optics.

Magazine Capacity: 6+1/Caliber: 12 Gauge 00 Slug/Fire Mode: Pump-Action//The M870 is an American produced 12 gauge pump-action shotgun dating back to the 1950s, commonly used for sporting and self-defence use. Its simplicity has lent itself to being modified in interesting ways, in this instance it has the stock from an M4 Assault Rifle, making it an extremely versatile and deadly weapon at close to medium range.
